name: Dana's Taco Salad
author: Dana Lawson
summary: This is my health-oriented twist to my Aunt Linda's recipe. Lentils add fiber and protein without fat and without compromising the taste! For additional texture, sprinkle in some crushed corn chips.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can pitted black olives, chopped
1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, drained and rinsed
directions: Place lentils and water in a pot
Bring water to boil, reduce to simmer
Cook for 30 minutes or until tender
Cook the turkey in a skillet over medium heat until no longer pink, 8 to 12 minutes
Stir the cooked lentils, 1 cup of water, and the   mix into the turkey
Bring mixture to a boil; reduce heat to low and simmer until liquid is nearly gone, about 5 minutes
Combine the lettuce, avocado, tomatoes, olives, kidney beans, lentil-and-turkey mixture, and Catalina dressing in a large bowl and toss until combined
